SubTypes.Name: SkavenSlave
SubTypes.Desc: Filth, weak and expendable. The frontbone and meat of the Skaven armies, weak but fast and cowardly.

SubTypes.Name: Skaven Engineer
SubTypes.Desc: True genius or Unfanthomable madness? it doesnt matter cause they build deadly tools. deadly for who? doesnt matter.

SubTypes.Name: Plague Monk
SubTypes.Desc: Invested with faith and more diseases than you can count, these fanatics spread pestilence and death wherever they go.
